form.customSlugHelp: Custom short links can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores, with a length between 3-20 characters. Examples: my-link, product_123
form.customSlugRequired: Please enter a custom short link

result.title: Your short link has been generated
result.description: You can share this link to let others access your original URL.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: View your URL shortener service overview

linkManagement.title: Link Management
linkManagement.description: On the 'Link Management' page, you can view, search, and delete short links.

security.title: Security Tips
security.description: Make sure to change your admin password regularly and keep your login credentials secure.

links.title: Link Management
links.subtitle: View and manage all short links

search.title: Search Links
search.placeholder: Search short link ID or URL...

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and application settings

announcement.title: Announcement Settings
announcement.languageSelectorHelp: Choose the language version of the announcement to edit
announcement.titlePlaceholder: Enter announcement title, leave empty to hide announcement
announcement.titleHelp: Setting the title to empty will hide the announcement
announcement.contentPlaceholder: Enter announcement content, supports Markdown format
announcement.contentHelp: Supports Markdown format, such as **bold**, *italic*, [link](URL), - list items, etc. Use \n for line breaks. The announcement will appear as a popup in the top-right corner and disappear after 8 seconds.

password.title: Change Password
password.allFieldsRequired: Please fill in all password fields
password.passwordMismatch: New password and confirmation do not match
password.passwordTooShort: New password must be at least 8 characters long

turnstile.title: Turnstile Human Verification
turnstile.enabledDescription: Users need to complete human verification to create short links
turnstile.disabledDescription: Users can create short links directly without human verification

security.title: Security Tips
security.passwordTip: Change your password regularly to maintain account security.
security.strongPasswordTip: Use strong passwords that include letters, numbers, and special characters.
security.turnstileTip: Enabling Turnstile human verification can prevent automated abuse.

reservedSlugs.title: Reserved Short Links
reservedSlugs.newSlugPlaceholder: Enter a short link to reserve
reservedSlugs.description: Reserved short links cannot be used by users to create custom short links. This helps prevent confusion and potential abuse.

errors.emptySlug: Please enter a short link to reserve
errors.invalidFormat: Short links can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores, with a length between 3-20 characters
errors.alreadyExists: This short link is already reserved

success.removed: Short link '{slug}' has been removed from reserved list
